plot: The descendents of the guardians of the light team up with enigmatic prophet Isiah Cloud to stop the evil demon Lord Velid from unleashing Hell on Earth.
title: Atomic Kingdom: Revolution
plot_es: The descendents of the guardians of the light team up with enigmatic prophet Isiah Cloud to stop the evil demon Lord Velid from unleashing Hell on Earth.
plot_en: The descendents of the guardians of the light team up with enigmatic prophet Isiah Cloud to stop the evil demon Lord Velid from unleashing Hell on Earth.
